news.headline: Apple Stock’s Resilience Means This Is an Opportunity, Says BofA. Plus, Meta, Occidental, and More.
news.summary: RESEARCH REPORTS These reports, excerpted and edited by Barron’s, were issued recently by investment and research firms. The reports are a sampling of analysts’ thinking; they should not be considered the views or recommendations of Barron’s.

news.headline: FuriosaAI Turns Down Meta's $800M Bid To Go Rogue With RNGD, As AI Chip War Between Nvidia, Google, And Meta Heats Up
news.summary: South Korean AI hardware startup FuriosaAI has made waves in the global semiconductor industry after reportedly turning down an $800 million acquisition offer from Meta (NASDAQ:META). The decision shows the startup's ambition to remain independent and compete directly in the rapidly evolving AI chip

news.headline: Meta's antitrust case, retail sales, housing data: What to Watch
news.summary: Here's what investors are watching during the week of April 14 to April 18. Meta Platforms (META) is set to face the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) as part of its antitrust case. news.headline: Meta to add Dina Powell McCormick, Patrick Collison to board
news.summary: Powell McCormick, who spent 16 years in senior leadership roles at Goldman Sachs, has previously served as deputy national security adviser to U.S. President Donald Trump in his first term.  She has also served as a senior White House adviser and as assistant secretary of state for Condoleezza Rice

news.headline: Correction to Meta Platforms Article
news.summary: Dina Powell McCormick has served presidents Donald Trump and George W. Bush. Meta Increases Board Size with Appointment of Collison, Powell McCormick at 5:43 p.m. ET incorrectly spelled Bush's name....
